00107 template <typename PixelType>
00108 TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType>::TBitmapIterator2d(const iimg::IBitmap* bitmapPtr)
00109 :      x(*this),
00110        y(*this)
00111 {
00112        I_ASSERT(bitmapPtr != NULL);
00113 
00114        m_imageBufferPtr = (PixelType*)(bitmapPtr->GetLinePtr(0));
00115        m_imageBufferBeginPtr = m_imageBufferPtr;
00116        m_linesDifference = bitmapPtr->GetLinesDifference();
00117        m_imageWidth = bitmapPtr->GetImageSize().GetX();
00118 
00119        int imageHeight = bitmapPtr->GetImageSize().GetY();
00120 
00121        m_imageBufferEndPtr = m_imageBufferPtr + m_linesDifference * imageHeight;
00122 }
00123

00138 template <typename PixelType>
00139 inline typename TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType>::ValueType& TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType>::operator*() const
00140 {
00141        I_ASSERT(IsValid());
00142               
00143        return *m_imageBufferPtr;

00147 template <typename PixelType>
00148 inline bool TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType>::IsValid() const
00149 {
00150        return ((m_imageBufferPtr >= m_imageBufferBeginPtr) &&
00151                      (m_imageBufferPtr < m_imageBufferEndPtr));
00152 }

00155 template <typename PixelType>
00156 inline void TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType>::MoveTo(int x, int y)
00157 {
00158        m_imageBufferPtr = const_cast<PixelType*>(m_imageBufferBeginPtr) + x + y * m_linesDifference;
00159 }
00160 
00161 
00162 template <typename PixelType>
00163 inline void TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType>::MoveTo(const istd::CIndex2d& index)
00164 {
00165        MoveTo(index.GetX(), index.GetY());
00166 }

00170 inline bool TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType>::operator < (const TBitmapIterator2d& iterator)

00173 
00174        return (m_imageBufferPtr < iterator.m_imageBufferPtr);
